volunteers.applications_description: Track the status of your volunteer applications for different conventions

team_distribution.description: Distribution of accepted volunteers in teams. On desktop: drag and drop. On mobile: click to select a team.

modal.add_description_multiple: Keep the volunteer in their current teams and also add them to "{targetTeam}"
modal.add_description_single: Keep the volunteer in "{sourceTeam}" and also assign them to "{targetTeam}"
modal.move_description_multiple: Remove the volunteer from all their current teams and place them in "{targetTeam}"
modal.move_description_single: Remove the volunteer from "{sourceTeam}" and place them in "{targetTeam}"
modal.question: What would you like to do?

team_distribution.no_assignments_description: Accepted volunteers will appear here once assigned to teams
team_distribution.title: Team Distribution
team_distribution.unassigned_description: These accepted volunteers have not yet been assigned to a team. On desktop: drag and drop. On mobile: click to select a team.

edition.description: Discover {name} taking place {date} in {location}. Information, program and registration for this juggling convention.
edition.keywords: juggling, convention, {convention}, {location}, event, festival, show, workshop
edition.og_description: Join us for {name} - {date}. Program, workshops and juggling shows.
edition.twitter_description: {name} - {date}. Discover the program of this juggling convention.

homepage.description: Discover upcoming juggling conventions in France and Europe. Organize your favorite events and connect with the juggling community.
homepage.keywords: juggling, convention, festival, event, juggler, show, workshop, training
homepage.og_description: The reference platform to discover and organize juggling conventions in France and Europe.
homepage.og_title: Juggling Convention - Find your next convention
homepage.title: Juggling Conventions
homepage.twitter_description: Discover upcoming juggling conventions and join the juggling community.

organization.description: Collaborative platform dedicated to the juggling community, facilitating the discovery and organization of juggling events in France and Europe.

search_action.description: Search for juggling conventions by name, location or organizer
search_action.name: Search for a convention

seo.site_description: Find and manage your favorite juggling conventions. Collaborative platform for jugglers and event organizers.
